column4: any idea how I can corretly reinstall xorg-driver-fglrx??? I have an error "dpkg-divert: mismatch on divert-to

2006-06-05T05:56:00.000Z	chamo		cf http://pastebin.com/759493
2006-06-05T05:56:00.000Z	chamo		thus I cant launch X anymore :/
2006-06-05T05:58:00.000Z	chamo		Anyone got an idea? Im stuck since a few days :/
2006-06-05T05:58:00.000Z	dou213	chamo	reboot into failsafe and do sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg"
your x server should start then
what do u mean even without network?
just do that command in failsafe mode, ur x server will work afterwards, did work for me
i had the same problem as u
how did you reinstall the drivers afterwards ?
I want to install xorg-driver and new fglrx related to my kernel version
anyone know how I can resolve a "divert" error while trying to reinstall my xorg-driver-fglrx packet with apt-get ??? Im stuck... cf http://pastebin.com/759493
